cast.name: 玛莎·希加瑞达 Martha Higareda
奥马尔·查帕罗 Omar Chaparro
亚历杭德罗·库塔拉 Alejandro Cuétara

writer.name: 玛莎·希加瑞达 Martha Higareda

director.name: 艾列尔·维诺格拉德 Ariel Winograd

introduction: Adán (Omar Chaparro) is a charming seducer who believes he knows how to make any woman swoon. He prepares to teach his friends the art of conquering women, using his array of bullet-proof rules of seduction. Mia (Martha Higareda) is an ambitious producer that dreams of having her own TV show on women empowerment called "Todos Caen," a strategic guide to dating that teaches you just how to hook a man- and have him eating from the palm of your hand in no time. Mia and Adán cross paths at a bar one fateful night, and from there the game is on in an all-out battle of the sexes. But as they test their finely honed seduction strategies on one another, both find that sometimes the more you play hard to get, the harder you may end up falling.
